functions.name: portal
functions.value: creates a voice channel and a category for it

functions.name: text
functions.value: creates a text channel connected to the voice channel

functions.name: regex
functions.value: sets regex-guidelines for how to name channels (current portal)

functions.name: run
functions.value: returns the log of data given in log_string

functions.name: prefix
functions.value: sets the new prefix for portal bot

functions.name: help
functions.value: returns a help-list of all commands and regex manipulation

functions.name: url
functions.value: creates a url only channel and a category for it
